Row.Text: Indicates this City is the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital of the empire. Contains 1 slot for a Great Work of Art. Contains 1 Merchant specialist slot.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_CONNECTED] Connecting other Cities to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital by Road will produce additional [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +3 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 Great Merchant point.

The Doge's Palace automatically appears in the capital city of the empire. It provides a small amount of [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and Great Merchant points for free and has a Merchant specialist slot. If you connect other cities to the capital by road or harbor, you will create city connections which generate additional income. If your capital city is captured, your Doge's Palace will automatically be rebuilt in another city. If you subsequently retake your original capital, the Doge's Palace will move back to its original location.
